  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:sodis.de:MELT-04632392.1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>DE.FWU</catalog>
            <entry>MELT-04632392.1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Zeitdilatation (Zeitdehnung)</string>
            <string language="en">Time dilation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dilatation de temps</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dilation do tempo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dilatazione di tempo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρονική διαστολή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dilatación del tiempo</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Die "Lichtuhr". Arbeitsblatt zu Einsteins These, dass bewegte Uhren langsamer gehen. Weiterführende Frage zum Verbot der "Überlichtgeschwindigkeit".</string>
            <string language="en">"Light clock". Worksheet on the Einstein thesis presuming that moved clocks run slowlier. Further question on the prohibition of "motion faster-than-the-speed-of-light"</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Lichtgeschwindigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Einstein, Albert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Zeitdilation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Lichtuhr</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Speed of light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Einstein, Albert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Time enlargement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Light clock</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">"horloge légère". Tableau sur la thèse 
d'Einstein présumant que les horloges déplacées exécutent 
slowlier. Davantage de question sur la prohibition de la 
"rapide-que-le-vitesse-de-lumière de mouvement"</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">"pulso de disparo claro". Folha no thesis 
de Einstein que presume que os pulsos de disparo movidos funcionam 
mais slowlier. Pergunta mais adicional na proibição do "da 
rápido-do que-$$$-VELOCIDADE-$$$-LUZ movimento"</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">"orologio chiaro". Foglio di lavoro sulla 
tesi di Einstein che presume che gli orologi spostati fanno funzionare
più slowlier. Ulteriore domanda sulla proibizione "della 
veloce-che-$$$-VELOCITÀ-DE-LUCE di movimento"</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"Ελαφρύ ρολόι". Φύλλο εργασίας στη διατριβή 
Einstein που θεωρεί ότι τα κινημένα ρολόγια τρέχουν pjo' 
σλοωληερ. Περαιτέρω ερώτηση στην απαγόρευση του 
"γρήγορος-από-ο-ταχύτητα-$$$-ΦΩΤΌΣ κινήσεων"</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">"reloj ligero". Hoja de trabajo en la tesis
de Einstein que presume que los relojes movidos ejecutan ma's 
slowlier. Pregunta adicional sobre la prohibición de la 
"ra'pido-que-$$$-VELOCIDAD-DE-LUZ del movimiento"</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vitesse de lumière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Einstein, Albert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Agrandissement de temps</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Horloge légère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Velocidade de luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Einstein, Albert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ampliação do tempo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pulso de disparo claro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Velocità di luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Einstein, Albert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ingrandimento di tempo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Orologio chiaro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταχύτητα του φωτός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Einstein, Αλβέρτος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρονική διεύρυνση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφρύ ρολόι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Velocidad de la luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Einstein, Albert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ampliación del tiempo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reloj ligero</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
